aria-label.description: Accessible label for the time picker

className.description: Additional classes added to the time picker.

delimiter.description: Character to display between the hour and minute

includeSeconds.description: Includes number of seconds with the chosen time and allows users to manually edit the seconds value.

inputProps.description: Additional props for input field (Type: TextInputProps)

invalidFormatErrorMessage.description: Error message to display when the time is provided in an invalid format.

invalidMinMaxErrorMessage.description: Error message to display when the time provided is not within the minTime/maxTime constraints

is24Hour.description: True if the time is 24 hour time. False if the time is 12 hour time

isDisabled.description: Flag indicating the time picker is disabled

isOpen.description: Flag to control the opened state of the time picker menu

maxTime.description: A time string indicating the maximum value allowed. The format could be an ISO 8601 formatted date string or in 'HH{delimiter}MM' format (Type: string | Date)

minTime.description: A time string indicating the minimum value allowed. The format could be an ISO 8601 formatted date string or in 'HH{delimiter}MM' format (Type: string | Date)

onChange.description:
Optional event handler called each time the value in the time picker input changes. (Function: (
  event: React.FormEvent<HTMLInputElement>,
  time: string,
  hour?: number,
  minute?: number,
  seconds?: number,
  isValid?: boolean
) => void)

placeholder.description: String to display in the empty time picker field as a hint for the expected time format

setIsOpen.description: Handler invoked each time the open state of time picker updates (Function: (isOpen?: boolean) => void)

stepMinutes.description: Size of step between time options in minutes.

time.description: A time string. The format could be  an ISO 8601 formatted date string or in 'HH{delimiter}MM' format (Type: string | Date)

validateTime.description: Optional validator can be provided to override the internal time validator. (Function: (time: string) => boolean)
